snippet: Even officials who support the stimulus agree that the Federal Reserve should taper off on its bond buying and focus on stimulating the economy by other means. It’s just a matter of timing.
abstract: Federal Reserve has made it clear that its bond-buying campaign will not continue at present pace for much longer; even officials who support the stimulus agree that the Fed should taper off and focus on stimulating the economy by other means; say it is just a matter of timing.
lead_paragraph: Even officials who support the stimulus agree that the Federal Reserve should taper off on its bond buying and focus on stimulating the economy by other means. It’s just a matter of timing.

headline.main: Many Detect End of Line for Stimulus by the Fed
headline.print_headline: Many Detect End of Line For Stimulus by the Fed
